#set 4k ultra to 4000x2700
#NTSC
writel 0xA0656584 0x0A8C0FA0
writew 0xA0656588 0x0403
#PAL
writel 0xA065CF04 0x0A8C0FA0
writew 0xA065CF08 0x0403
#set 1080p ultra 90p to 2000x1500
#NTSC
writel 0xA0656D64 0x05DC07D0
writew 0xA0656D68 0x0403
#PAL
writel 0xA065D6E4 0x05DC07D0
writew 0xA065D6E8 0x0403
